title: Cold Lonely Courage
description: Madeleine Toche races to the front only to find her brother mortally wounded during the German Blitzkrieg attack on France at the outset of World War II. His death and her rape at the hands of an SS Stormtrooper cast Madeleine down a path of death and violence when she joins the British Special Operation Executive. Killing the Gestapo is one thing, but when sheâ€™s sent after Field Marshall Erwin Rommel the entire German Army stands in her way.
author: Soren Paul Petrek
